name: Juke Project
description: A tiny game that I used as a way to get used to Game Maker studio 2. Your object is to go through a maze and find all 4 records while fighting off bar inspired enemy's.  Its very rough but when I was done I felt proud of my work. The main aspect of this game for me was the sound and sprites. When it came to making video games this was the first game I had ever made that had sound and was 2d.
